name: No Uprooting Please!
description:
A game about a nettle that does not want to be uprooted by a gardener.

This is a 1v1 game, and requires a friend. One of you controls the nettle, and the other controls the gardener.

The gardener uses the arrow keys (or 8, 4, 6, and 2 on the numpad) to attack from up, down, left, or right.

Once the gardener has attacked, a small indicator will appear in the corresponding direction.

The nettle has to be quick, and push WASD in the direction the attack is coming from.
The more times the nettle successfully evades, the harder it gets.

The gardener can not spam attacks, and neither can the nettle.

Thanks to Seanslebblanc for the Better Minimal WebGL Template used.

Made for Global Game Jam 2023
